app.title: Go to Market
app.subtitle: FDA Compliance Checker for Food Exports
app.description: Verify if your food products meet FDA requirements for export to the US market

home.intro: Your comprehensive FDA compliance verification tool for food product exports to the United States.

features.title: What We Check
features.labelingDesc: Nutrition Facts, ingredient lists, allergen declarations, and more
features.facilityDesc: FDA facility registration, Prior Notice, and foreign supplier verification
features.safetyDesc: HACCP, FSMA Preventive Controls, and GMP compliance

assessmentMode.title: Choose Assessment Method
assessmentMode.description: Select how you'd like to complete your FDA compliance assessment.

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Upload a photo of your product packaging. Our AI will analyze it and pre-fill the labeling requirements for you.

manual.title: Manual Input
manual.description: Answer each compliance question manually. Ideal if you don't have a product image available.

imageUpload.title: Upload Product Packaging
imageUpload.description: Upload a clear photo of your food product's packaging. Include the Nutrition Facts panel and ingredient list if possible.
imageUpload.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload a JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF image.
imageUpload.tooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis Results
aiAnalysis.description: Review and adjust the AI's analysis of your product packaging. You can modify any answers before proceeding.
aiAnalysis.analysisFailed: Analysis failed. Please try again or use manual input.

nutritionFacts.question: Does your product have a compliant Nutrition Facts panel?
nutritionFacts.help: Must include serving size, calories, nutrients per FDA format

ingredientList.question: Is the ingredient list in descending order by weight?
ingredientList.help: Ingredients must be listed from most to least by weight

allergenDeclaration.question: Does the label declare all Big 9 allergens if present?
allergenDeclaration.help: Milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, soybeans, sesame

netQuantity.question: Is the net quantity statement displayed correctly?
netQuantity.help: Must show both metric and US customary units

manufacturerInfo.question: Is manufacturer/distributor information included?
manufacturerInfo.help: Name and address of manufacturer, packer, or distributor

countryOfOrigin.question: Is the country of origin clearly marked?

fdaRegistration.question: Is your facility registered with the FDA?
fdaRegistration.help: Foreign facilities must register with FDA before exporting to US

priorNotice.question: Do you submit Prior Notice for each shipment?
priorNotice.help: Required before food arrives at US port of entry

fsvp.question: Is there a Foreign Supplier Verification Program in place?
fsvp.help: US importers must verify foreign suppliers meet FDA standards

haccp.question: Do you have a HACCP plan (if applicable)?
haccp.help: Hazard Analysis Critical Control Points plan

fsma.question: Are you compliant with FSMA Preventive Controls?

gmp.question: Do you follow Good Manufacturing Practices?

hazardAnalysis.question: Is hazard analysis documentation available?
hazardAnalysis.help: Documentation of identified hazards and preventive controls

recommendations.nutritionFacts: Update your Nutrition Facts panel to meet FDA format requirements. Consider using FDA's labeling guide.
recommendations.ingredientList: Reorder your ingredient list to show ingredients from most to least by weight.
recommendations.allergenDeclaration: Review your product for Big 9 allergens and ensure proper declaration on the label.
recommendations.netQuantity: Add net quantity in both metric (g, ml) and US customary (oz, fl oz) units.
recommendations.manufacturerInfo: Include complete manufacturer/distributor name and address on the label.
recommendations.countryOfOrigin: Add 'Product of [Country]' or 'Made in [Country]' to your label.
recommendations.fdaRegistration: Register your facility with FDA through the FDA Industry Systems (FIS).
recommendations.priorNotice: Set up Prior Notice submission process through FDA's Prior Notice System Interface.
recommendations.fsvp: Work with your US importer to establish a Foreign Supplier Verification Program.
recommendations.haccp: Develop a HACCP plan identifying critical control points for your production process.
recommendations.fsma: Review FSMA Preventive Controls requirements and implement necessary controls.
recommendations.gmp: Implement Good Manufacturing Practices per 21 CFR Part 117.
recommendations.hazardAnalysis: Document all identified hazards and corresponding preventive controls.
